DOC.brief_summary: To determine if proprietary software that uses pulse-wave analysis to interpret the output of a conventional pulse-oximeter, can predict the onset of circulatory stress, before changes in blood pressure and pulse occur, in patients undergoing outpatient hemodialysis.
DOC.brief_title: Measuring Cardiovascular Stress in Patients on Hemodialysis
DOC.criteria: Patients having regular outpatient dialysis treatments Patients who are willing and able to provide informed consent Patients who do not wish to participate Patients with contraindications to attachment of monitoring devices Patients with skin rash or hypersensitivity to the adhesive sensors
